required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of SHR0410 in Hemodialysis Patients With Pruritus
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multiple Ascending Dose Study on Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of SHR0410 in Hemodialysis Subjects With Moderate to Severe Pruritus

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of SHR0410 in hemodialysis patients with moderate to severe pruritus

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of any adverse events that occurred between the first administration and the 48-hour period following the last administration
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of repeated doses of SHR0410

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410
To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410
To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410
To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410
To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410
To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410

secondary_outcome.measure: The ratio of AUC0-t after the first and last administration.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate pharmacokinetic (PK) of repeated doses of SHR0410

facility.name: The first affiliated hospital of sun yat-sen university
